topic.title: How To's with the HP Cloud OS Volume Service

body.p: Tasks are described as being performed by a user or administrator.

section.title: Tasks performed by users
section.p: The following Volume Operations service tasks are usually performed by someone with the user role.

required-cleanup.title: Create a bootable volume from an image in Glance
Create / delete a snapshot of a volume
Create / delete a backup of a volume in Swift
Create a volume from a backup in Swift
Update the metadata of a volume
Create an image in Glance from a volume
Modify the quota values of a project
Enable / Disable a service
required-cleanup.p: The following Volume Operations service tasks are usually performed by someone with the administrator role.

required-cleanup.title: Create / Modify / Delete a public image
Add/update metadata for a public image
